price: Har idan Mun bũɗe, akansu, wata ƙõfa mai azãba mai tsanani sai gã su a cikinta sunã mãsu mugi.*
arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا فَتَحۡنَا عَلَيۡهِم بَابٗا ذَا عَذَابٖ شَدِيدٍ إِذَا هُمۡ فِيهِ مُبۡلِسُونَ
footnotes: * Mugi, shi ne kãsa yin magana sabõda ɗebe tsammãni daga sãmun kõwane alheri. Asalin kalmar daga Fulãtanci take.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: ḥattā idhā fataḥnā ʿalayhim bāban dhā ʿadhābin shadīdin idhā hum fīhi mub'lisūna
